column1: '''Thorsten Renk''' is a German linguist of [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s invented [[languages]].<ref>[http://groups.yahoo.com/group/elfling/message/28076 Message 28076] at [[Elfling]]</ref> He is the creator of the [http://www.science-and-fiction.org/elvish/index.html Parma Tyelpelassiva] website.  Since 2013
column2: he is a member of the Review Panel of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]''.<ref>{{VT|50}}
